Author: bluejam
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Well, I did check out the tutorial again and can't really see where I'm going off track. Just tried the "withdraw all" option after lowering gwei to 5 and gas to 200.000 (=0.12$) and the spectre website basicly said "everything is fine. request sent to the blockchain". Well, the transaction failed because the gas was too low (why?!). Either way, it wanted to transfer "0 ETH" in that failed transaction and now I can't even choose "withdraw all" anymore, so I would have to try to resend each week on its own at a higher gas price. The transaction costs would be much higher than the dividends.   edit: Ok, so apparently I can't choose my own gwei/gas ratio. Another test with the given ratio worked. Oh man, I wish the "withdraw all" option was back though. Time to contact the support I guess.  edit2: email is out. will report back.

Author: bluejam
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: "Following the Ethereum fork (Constantinople) that took place at the end of February, we are experiencing issues with some of the functionalities in the rewards portal of Spectre.ai.   Although the rewards are being issued with the same frequency as before, the functionalities of updating the user’s balance and withdrawing rewards are not working as previously. This is due to the recent updates in the Ethereum blockchain and the syncing process with our servers and our team is working around the clock to resolve the issue and allow all SXDT holders to be able to withdraw their rewards again.   Please note that the above is not related with the actual balance of the SXDT tokens in your account that you may quickly verify on etherscan.io.   We would like to apologize for the inconvenience and thank you in advance for your understanding.  Best, The SPECTRE.ai Team"

Author: klarki
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: First you need to register on the platform: https://rewards.spectre.ai/register  Second, you must pass the KYC procedure.  Withdrawal of rewards  Metamask  Quote You also need to have downloaded Metamask and imported your ETH wallet account on it.  Once the above is done, then please follow the following simple steps.  - Step 1: Login to rewards.spectre.ai/ from a Google Chrome or Mozilla Firefox browser.  - Step 2: Add all the ETH addresses where you hold tokens inside the platform.   Full instructions: https://medium.com/teamspectreai/how-to-withdraw-your-rewards-part-1-metamask-9c5be6d2ac90  Nano Ledger S  Quote The following is a guide on how to withdraw your rewards from the rewards portal of Spectre.ai. It is important to note that in order to claim your rewards you need first to have registered an account and also completed the KYC onboarding process.  Important note: You will need to have the SXDT tokens in one of the first five Ledger Nano S addresses.  Once the above is done, then please follow the following simple steps.  - Step 1: Login to rewards.spectre.ai/ from a Google Chrome browser  - Step 2: Add all the ETH addresses where you hold tokens inside the platform.   Full instructions: https://medium.com/teamspectreai/how-to-withdraw-rewards-part-2-nano-ledger-s-c6cf26802d1a  Trezor  Quote The following is a guide on how to withdraw your rewards from the rewards portal of Spectre.ai. It is important to note that in order to claim your rewards you need first to have registered an account and also completed the KYC onboarding process.  Step 1: Log in to rewards.spectre.ai from a Google Chrome browser.  Step 2: Add all the ETH addresses where you hold tokens inside the platform.  Full instructions: https://medium.com/teamspectreai/how-to-withdraw-rewards-part-4-trezor-directly-5bfa1abc9c8e

Author: Nadia_l
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Maybe because even decentralized exchanges could be blamed in the conducting unlegal operations with the tokens that are securities. It all depends on the regulations where the legal entity is registered and nobody wants to be investigated and charged with an offense or crime by SEC of local financial commission.    Nowadays, one of the main tasks of the SEC is to investigate the cryptocurrency market and investment facilities related to it in order to reveal any illegal actions, such as selling securities under the guise of tokens. So far, even if DEX oneself is not a part of sell/buy operations it could be accused for the assistance in the exchange operations.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: You can't buy anything on the platform. It is a financial prediction market platform. Prediction markets (also known as predictive markets, information markets, decision markets, idea futures, event derivatives, or virtual markets) are exchange-traded markets created for the purpose of trading the outcome of events. The market prices can indicate what the crowd thinks the probability of the event is. A prediction market contract trades between 0 and 100%. It is a binary option that will expire at the price of 0 or 100%. Prediction markets can be thought of as belonging to the more general concept of crowdsourcing which is specially designed to aggregate information on particular topics of interest. The main purposes of prediction markets are eliciting aggregating beliefs over an unknown future outcome. Traders with different beliefs trade on contracts whose payoffs are related to the unknown future outcome and the market prices of the contracts are considered as the aggregated belief. You can learn more about prediction markets here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Prediction_market  Here is a video about what spectre is: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bchSDalTbA8&feature=youtu.be Spectre.ai in under 10 min! Kay, the CEO of Spectre.ai, the world's first broker-less trading platform that removes the financial broker out of the equation, details the story in under 10 minutes. A must watch for traders and investors alike! https://youtu.be/D37kqqmhO2o

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: I believe the tokens are collecting dividends the whole time but please email support@spectre.ai and they can tell you for sure.    Quote from: Pizza35kk on May 03, 2018, 11:42:24 AM I have a question. Does the Digital Options, Forex and CFD traders know about cryptos and trading that to. I tried to Google. The question is...Is it goin to be a struggle to adapt them to do the trades with ETH, wats the plan? Just wondering though I still think we'll go to the moon   20% of the tokens held by the team will be used for Option Pool & M&A Reserve and 40% of the funds raised will be used for User acquisition (organic & M&A). From Kay from back in December: We have an organic and inorganic (acquisitive growth) strategy planned for the next 3 years. Organic, we already reach a few thousand traders who are fed up of trading on archaic platforms both on the BO and FX side (read: spot and/or mt4/5). So they will migrate over quite readily. On top of this, we have already been approached by some so called "super affiliates" or IBs (introducing brokers) who control large communities of traders who wish to be early affiliates of the Spectre customer acquisition program. Thirdly, we have a $1.8m budget on pure customer acquisition spend via CPA payments + tokens (for specific IBs only). As for the inorganic growth, post ICO, depending on our raise we will purchase 1-2 brokerages (one of which is a market leader in 1 European country, looking to exit) resulting in us bolting on around 5-10,000 users pretty much from the get go. In light of this, our Year 1 forecasts are possibly conservative.   With regards to on-boarding, we will offer simple media assets that explain the switch-over and also do it for clients for a fee if required along with our upcoming partnership with a major exchange in the U.s.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: In order to use the SXUT tokens on the trading platform, you'll need to register your eth wallet holding those tokens so that you can unlock the privileges you want with your tokens.  In order to collect dividends with the SXDT tokens, you'll need to register your eth wallet holding those tokens so the rewards portal knows how much in dividends you are eligible for.  This is not new information.  It has been stated time and time again since the ICO launched.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Quote from: asdlolciterquit on April 29, 2018, 11:29:04 AM Quote from: Spectre.ai.team on April 28, 2018, 06:10:49 PM Spectre.ai Rewards Portal Goes Live ___ https://medium.com/teamspectreai/spectre-ai-rewards-portal-goes-live-bb804df1d58e ___     thank you for sharing this information. I read this: "Please note, the current version of the rewards portal has full support for Metamask withdrawals (which supports ERC20 compatible wallets and wallets created in MEW) but not hardware wallets such as Ledger or Trezor. Ledger support will be added within 10 business days and other wallets, over the course of the next 3 months."  I use my myetherwallet's private key with a trezor hardware wallet. I don't understand...if i wait to the trezor support, i will lose first dividends airdrop?  Trezor and Ledger support will be added this coming week.  They are not supported at this time.  You will not loos any of your dividends by not claiming them right away.  There is no longer a time frame on when they have to be withdrawn, dividends will now accumulate indefinitely.     Quote from: frcat on April 29, 2018, 11:46:55 AM How much devidends I can receive for 1000 SXDT tokens for example in this month? Amount of dividends will be grow every month? Quote from: Randomaze on April 29, 2018, 12:04:12 PM Quote from: frcat on April 29, 2018, 11:46:55 AM How much devidends I can receive for 1000 SXDT tokens for example in this month? Amount of dividends will be grow every month? Yes, tell me more about this investment and the rewards for it. I am the holder of Spectre tokens. How many tokens do I need and what kind of reward can I expect?  This total first distributable reward is 370.8 ETH (c. $254,000) and is available to SXDT holders. Of that amount, 6.1 ETH is from trading volumes generated by traders in Spectre’s first test-month, untl 25th of April, and the remainder 364.7 ETH, from the DALP based passive proprietary participation in the wider markets (already declared earlier this year). That 370.8 eth is then divided by all SXDT tokens 140,270,691 which comes out to  0.00000264346027923966 eth per token, or roughly $0.0018107845494252 per token.  You only need 1 token to collect dividends.  You can see future forecasts for dividends here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1objxZEuzpatrbv4y2uMHwCzwyAIOaJU1UgEqkP1GoVM/edit#gid=553412931 Please note that these are listed in yearly payouts so would need to be divided by 52 to see weekly payout numbers.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: My ether wallet, Mist, MetaMask, imtoken, coinomi and many more have been used.  The only wallet I know it wasn't compatible with is Jaxx. You may have to add a custom token to your wallet if it hasn't yet been added to their base.  Make sure that your wallet supports custom tokens.  As for exchanges, the team is doing thorough vetting of exchanges for listing of their tokens.  There are a lot of exchanges that do not list dividend model tokens and the SXDT token pays a dividend. You can see where the token is located here: https://www.spectre.ai/investors

Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: The platform is not live yet.  It's in private beta and you needed a code to get in.  If you are trying to register for the dividend portal, please note that it is a totally separate system from the platform.  You'll need to create a separate login to access it.  To do that: You can do that by going here: https://www.spectre.ai/investors Then scroll down to: REWARDS Please click here in order to login to the rewards portal and here in order to create an account. Please note that this portal requires different credentials than the trading platform.  You'll have to go through KYC for this since it is separate from the trading platform and the ICO.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Dear all,  Earlier today certain exchanges and blockchain projects have reported an ‘overflow’ vulnerability that has affected certain ERC-20 based tokens across the board. After conducting due diligence on ours, we can confirm none of Spectre’s smart contracts (including SXUT and SXDT) are affected. All arithmetic in contracts is using safe math and during audits prior to release we check for under/over flow.  Thanks,  Spectre TECH

Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: As stated many times you'll need to register on the site once registration goes live as the information from beta and the token sale will not transfer to the site.  Registration should be going live soon.  For more information you can email team@spectre.ai or check back here for more updates.    Quote from: gembira on April 22, 2018, 01:55:06 AM Quote from: btcrich2020 on April 18, 2018, 07:42:24 AM Quote from: Spectre.ai.team on April 15, 2018, 02:29:31 PM Quote from: asdlolciterquit on April 15, 2018, 11:38:22 AM Quote from: abonarea on April 15, 2018, 09:25:49 AM We will see increase in demand of SXDT token with the passage of time when platform will be fully functional and SXUT utility token will be bought back to be burned. At start the price can be somewhat same as they are available now with little difference. In future low supply based tokens will reach at high caps and their value will be in two or three digits in fiat.  i'm sorry, i don't understand one thing. Why do you talk about "burned SXUT"? If i remeber well, SXUT can be use to trade financial instruments on the spectre's platform. Maybe you mean "use" instead of "burn"?  If not, can you explain me better?  Thank you!  There is a Buyback Program for the SXUT tokens.  Tokens acquired in the Buyback Program will be burned. You can read more about the Buyback program here: https://d1zzssn32v8b7a.cloudfront.net/media/spectre_token_buyback_v_2_1.pdf  Till now, i have not gone through this buyback program for SXUT, so on what basis you are going to pay the dividends and buyback for SXUT? People have some confusion about the SXDT dividends, only the first people will get the dividends or all the people who are holding the coin will get the dividends?  For buyback program intented only 3% of tokens. Rest 97% of fee - their profit, investors dividends, etc. But there are no detail about price of this buyback program. This will be higher price than current market price?  SXUT tokens will be bought from exchanges when buy backs happen, not directly from tokens holders for specific prices.  For more information you can email team@spectre.ai

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Hello.  The ICO actually ended December 10, 2017. Since that time the platform has been in beta.  It is currently in a private beta real money stress test, limited to 100 people, for the month of April.  Then it will launch live.  Please email your feedback to team@spectre.ai regarding the issues you've had using the beta version of the platform so that any issues can be addressed before it goes live.  Thank you for your feedback.

Author: Wheelige
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: I think that team spectre really deserve some credit for the way they dealt with the above post. The poster was clearly uninformed, made a bad decision and is now upset. I just hope they weren't one of the 100 traders because i can only hope it is competent people who are making numerous trades and properly stress testing the system so that on full go live Spectre know exactly what they are dealing with. Literally everything about the post grinds my gears.  Well, if you buy something at almost 8x from pre-ico (5x from ico) within months of ico maybe you should expect a decline. Plus the whole crypto market had a bleed and this would have had a major effect on SXDT/SXUT price (look at the correlation between almost every coin and bitcoin on coinmarketcap). Nothing to do with Spectre, just your unfortunate decision.  I seem to remember their pre actual money platform looking pretty snazzy, I cant imagine thats turned to shit. Sure 'normies' coming to the platform would be great but you really want the active traders. People that are going to put real money into the platform.  Keep up the good work Kay and Spectre, I whitelisted for this as soon as I knew about your idea and cant wait till your revolutionary system is fully live.

And I don't understand why this is necessary ??   The dividend portal will be going live in a few short weeks. The first dividends will be towards the end of April and, as stated time and time again,  you must register on the platform and go through KYC to be eligiable to collect dividends as the platform is closed to some places, meaning that you cannot collect dividends if you are in areas where the platform is not available to you to use. Once registration on the platform is live, you'll be able to go through KYC. For what is required for KYC, you'll need to contact team@spectre.ai and they can assist you with that. The platform is currently in a month long private beta real money stress stess. This is for the whole month of April.   Quote from: forghu on April 14, 2018, 02:59:29 AM What is the significance of trading the instruments on the spectre platform? Can I make worldly/political bets? Apologies for very Newbie question  The Spectre.ai trading platform is a brokerless platform, meaning there is no middleman for you to deal with when placing trades or collecting your winnings.  This short video goes explains how it works: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bchSDalTbA8&feature=youtu.be This slightly longer video goes over it in greater detail: https://youtu.be/D37kqqmhO2o  Quote from: Brilliantrocket on April 14, 2018, 12:02:08 PM If I have sxdt in a metamask account do Eth dividends get paid into that eth wallet?  Yes.  You'll have to register your wallet on the platform once it's live.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Just to be clear on what Spectre.ai is, Spectre isn’t a currency exchange (like Binance). It is actually a financial prediction market platform. The platform is in a private beta real money stress test for the month of April, then it will go live. I believe the date for the dividend locker launch is April 24th (give or take a day or 2). The platform should then launch in May but I haven't seen a date yet.  You can email team@spectre.ai for more details.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Quote from: luchins on April 05, 2018, 05:50:31 AM Quote from: Spectre.ai.team on April 04, 2018, 07:27:21 PM Quote from: luchins on April 04, 2018, 05:23:56 PM   I  have  Spectre  dividend token in Myetherwallet  Am I  elegible to   collect     dividends?    In order to be eligible to collect dividends you'll need to register on the platform once it's live and go through KYC. Also note that owing to a tightening of the legal framework in certain restricted jurisdictions such as the United States this year, for those specifically wanting to pull dividends, KYC will be performed onsite using Jumio. The procuring of SXDT tokens by U.S citizens on exchanges is against the Spectre.ai terms and conditions and dividends will not be paid to U.S citizens.  hello, I am  EU  citizen.    I am  not USA.  When  will the platform go  trought  live?  I  will upload  the  documents  for KYC.  Then  can I  keep    spectre dividends token  in Myetherwallet  and  still collect dividends or  do I need  to move the coins to  the S.P.E.C.T.R.E.  platform?  Hello.  The platform is currently in a month long private beta real money stress test.  I believe the this beta is now full but you can email team@spectre.ai for more information if you want to participate.  To learn more about this beta, please read this article https://medium.com/teamspectreai/spectre-ai-to-launch-real-money-private-beta-reserve-your-place-d1bf3a70b996 If you are participating in this beta, please refer to this article for providing feedback https://medium.com/teamspectreai/private-beta-how-to-provide-feedback-742b3cb61d16  Once the platform goes live (not this private beta stress test), you'll be able to register on the platform, go through KYC, and register your eth wallet address you have your SXDT in for collecting dividends.  PLEASE DO NOT USE AN EXCHANGE WALLET.  Wallets such as MetaMask, Mist, MEW are fine. You do not need to keep your SXDT tokens on the platform to collect your dividends.  For more information on collecting your dividends, please refer to this document here: https://d1zzssn32v8b7a.cloudfront.net/media/spectre_dividend_protocol_SXDT.pdf

Author: davidjoshua
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Most brokers shut down during MOC buddy. We atleast keep it open. Global fx liquidity drops by 80-90% making the MOC period very highly predictable. Drunk people off the street can make money in that period and thats not entirely a fair trading condition. Hence the lunch money sized trades. We can just switch off trading during that hour or drop payouts to ridiculously low levels but thats what binary.com does.

Author: sunshinelavapie
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: For what it's worth here are my thoughts. Kay and the team have robustly managed expectations with numbers which are obviously on the low side and are reflected in the forecast spreadsheet.  They have verbally advised the community their internal targets are much higher but don't want to share those with us. So that leaves a void and that void is filled by this type of debate. I do think as a community we have followed Kays approach and managed expectations but I do also think we've been too quick to shoot down people who have different views to the majority. I believe everyone has the same right to voice their opinions whether they are a short term investor or long term holder. I think we have been too risk adverse as a community and I for one am ready for us to enjoy the fact that we are going to receive life changing money and I'm comfortable in speculating on returns if spectre won't commit to a sharing their internal forecast. so instead of challenging Steve I would like to thank him for doing something for the community.  Cheers mate

Author: kevinantonio
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: The official forecast is there for a reason, namely to not give unrealistic lambo expectations to investors. In particular it doesn't help new investors coming here and seeing the inflated numbers (relative to the official forecast, Chris) - evident in the comment I responded to where some poor guy might have mistaken the inflated numbers (Chris, again, inflated relative to the official forecast, ok?) for a guaranteed payout. Kay is working very hard to keep everyone's feet on the ground, that's the reason this channel has been spared all when-lambo idiots. People checking in to get greeted by numbers pulled out of thin air or someone's ass isn't helping whatsoever, it will attract more idiots here and mgmt will waste more energy and time managing a lower quality community. WHEN FUCKING LAMBO?

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Please note that although the option to trade directly via MetaMask is a completely decentralized method to interact with Spectre.ai, there might be traders that would choose to trade via making a deposit to the on-site private escrow account where their funds are 100% safe and Spectre.ai has no access to, as by doing so: They will not need to have/use MetaMask There will be less chances that the trade will not happen for unexpected reasons (for example failed transaction due to not sufficient funds in the account to cover for the gas cost of the transaction) They will not pay the gas cost for the trade.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: A special month long private beta launches March 31. You can read more about that here: The platform is all systems go end april/may 1st.   Quote from: sunshinelavapie on March 21, 2018, 02:15:28 PM Will users still have to face regular issue which they face among brokers EXAMPLE;   manipulation of prices If no,  what makes the difference and how do users guarantee and checkmate that?  SPECTRE, short for speculative tokenized trading exchange, is a financial prediction market platform backed by a tokenized liquidity pool. Built on the Ethereum blockchain, SPECTRE's platform combined with the decentralised and autonomous liquidity pool owned by the token sale investors takes the broker out of the equation completely resulting in a revolutionary change in the trading world and a new level of transparency. This deals with Digital Options, Forex and CFD trading.  Price feeds come from Oanda that is 1 provider but they are confirmed by 2 others and then sent as a packet to Oraclize. Then they are ingested by our smart contract.  For more information on this you can email team@spectre.ai and they can assist you with this.

Author: filsid
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Spectre.ai Forms Strategic Alliance With Blitzpredict.io    1st February, Tortola, British Virgin Islands: Spectre.ai, the world’s first broker-less trading platform has announced a strategic alliance with prediction market data aggregator, Blitzpredict.io.  Blitzpredict.io will provide predictive tools for a range of events and markets to allow bettors/traders to garner insights about a range of prediction markets, on their platform. If users wish to trade financial prediction markets, they will be forwarding non-U.S traffic to the Spectre.ai trading platform.  Blitzpredict.io has a growing reach in the cryptocurrency and traditional gambling space with an estimated user base of over 20,000. Athol Nourse, business development director at Spectre.ai stated “This is a great partnership which optimizes the value for the end user client. Blitzpredict is an exciting project with a good team which is focused on bringing transparency to the online betting markets. Offering their non-U.S clients the opportunity to trade on the Spectre.ai platform is a natural progression since we share the same values & I am confident their clients will reach maximum satisfaction by trading with Spectre which is one of the world’s safest online trading environments. I believe that our platform will grow in popularity and this partnership takes us one step forward in our mission.”  Brett Richey, CEO of Blitzpredict.io, echoed Nourse’s sentiments “We are excited to work with Spectre.ai as we explore new frontiers in trading and prediction markets. There is a lot of synergy and overlap between sports, crypto, and financial trading, so the partnership is a natural fit. Our users will benefit from the margins and safety of the Spectre platform.”  The Spectre.ai trading platform launches on March 31st, 2018. It is strictly closed to U.S citizens. Blitzpredict.io is currently underway with its token generation event and aims to launch its platform in Q1 2018.  https://cryptocoin.news/press-releases/spectre-ai-forms-strategic-alliance-with-blitzpredict-io-6578/

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Quote The cost of privileges is pegged to the dollar value of said privileges as shown in column B and as such if SXUT prices on exchanges fluctuate, so will the level of SXUT quantity required to unlock and keep unlocked the privileges. The cost of privileges is denominated in SXUT tokens and the Spectre.ai platform will ping your registered ERC20 wallet address to determine if you hold enough quantities in order to unlock and keep the privileges unlocked. You do not need to spend tokens, just hold in order to unlock.  You cannot purchase access to the SXUT token privileges with any form of payment. You must hold SXUT to have access to them.  So, no worries!

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Spectre Boosts Team With Strategic Hires To Scale Growth ___   ___  27th January, Tortola, British Virgin Islands: Spectre.ai, the world’s first broker-less trading platform has announced hires Hitesh Juneja, Athol Nourse, and Ian Buck, to head up their global business development activities and scale up users on the Spectre.ai and DALP (decentralized autonomous liquidity pool) framework. ___ From 2009 until the present, he has been co-founder and head of business development at J&H Business Institute Corp, growing the group’s revenues to $20 million. From 2013 until the present, he has also headed up business development at INFINii Group where his marketing campaigns generated over $30 million in revenue, over 600,000 leads, over 200,000 customers and oversaw $3 billion + in indirect e-commerce sales volume.  Hitesh will now be grouping his skills to drive user growth on the Spectre.ai trading platform. He brings tremendous energy and exposure to the Spectre.ai platform and expressed as such “The DALP represents one of the first truly practical innovations using blockchain technology and holds the potential to create truly trust-less, tokenized platforms in multiple industries. I’m very excited to be working with the Spectre team to make Spectre.ai, one of the DALP’s first apps, the standard for all online fraud-free trading.” Juneja commented. ___  Read the whole story: https://cryptocoin.news/news/altcoin/spectre-boosts-team-with-strategic-hires-to-scale-growth-6312/

Register to the webinar here (scheduled on Fri, Feb 2, 2018 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM CET): https://register.gotowebinar.com/register/1008085425231298562  Tokens are in the process of being listed at certain exchanges, more information over February. Body: I wrote a complaint to Mr. Sylon on the official email team Spectre, but no response. Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Spectre.ai Community Update! ___    ___ Spectre.ai and Trakinvest.ai form strategic partnership ___ Spectre.ai has formed a strategic alliance with Trakinvest.ai, the world’s first virtual social trading platform for equities and cryptocurrencies. TrakInvest, headquartered in Singapore, has a three year operating track record with strong existing partnerships with financial services companies, universities and governments in the region. In addition to working together at an operating level, Spectre.ai will also be strategically participating in TrakInvest’s token sale.  TrakInvest will act both as an education and customer-acquisition partner for Spectre in Asia. With over 100,000 traders, TrakInvest has a broad reach in the Asian market. In addition, TrakInvest’s trader analytics and custom indicators will appear on the Spectre’s trading platform to empower retail traders with AI driven sentiment analysis tools, along with Spectre’s onboard SpecED crypto and asset education academy. Spectre.ai will be conducting an AMA with the CEO of Trakinvest.ai, Bobby Bhatia, shortly. We will email around with a webinar link.  More details on this alliance can be found here: https://www.einpresswire.com/article/425153208/spectre-ai-and-trakinvest-ai-form-strategic-partnership

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Spectre.ai has formed a strategic alliance with Caviar. The team behind Caviar is pioneering a unique approach to create a dual-purpose token and crowdfunding platform built on the Ethereum blockchain. Caviar’s token offers access to income producing real estate debt and fast growing cryptocurrencies, with built-in downside protection and automatic diversification. Caviar’s token generating event will run until January 31, 2018 with the goal of raising $25 million in total.  Spectre.ai's DALP (decentralised autonomous liquidity pool) will be playing a Passive Participation role in in the Caviar.io loan-book and crypto portfolio and CEO of Spectre.ai, Kay Khemani, will be becoming an advisor to Caviar.io. Recall that SXDT income is tied directly to DALP growth.  There is a live webinar between Spectre.ai and MIT educated Kiril Bensonoff, CEO of Caviar, scheduled on Thursday, 18th of January at 2pm GMT (9am EST).  You can register here and find out more about Caviar.io. https://register.gotowebinar.com/register/8548978171894479873  Sincerely, The Spectre.ai Team

Author: bluejam
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: One month is A LOT of time to work out your own personal token ratio. It's not Spectre's fault that the ETH network was under stress (which it wasn't for 30 days straight by the way). Nevertheless increasing GAS/GWEI always works to push your transactions through. This is a long term hodl - doesn't matter if you own U- or D-tokens - so who cares if you have to pay a little bit more to receive the tokens you need/want.  If you were not satisfied with the way they handled the "forced" distribution -which was announced in advance- maybe you shouldn't have invested?  Love how entitled plenty of crypto users feel. It's ridiculous.

This project has so much room to grow so just watch ED very closely for any good buy opportunities as you always want from a project like Spectre.

Author: fishervwb
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Spectre.ai beta out  Dear all, As 2017 draws to a close, we are pleased to announce our early, public beta on time, as per our roadmap. The spectre.ai trading platform, as you recall, was in alpha mode for over 3 months with thousands of traders who tested it in a virtual environment. Now, as we enter beta, traders will be able to also take demo money trades on the platform with Ethereum TestNet integration (Ropsten) as an extra option on top of the existing option of a virtual account with virtual ETH. This means they will be able to see when their trades are actually mined on the blockchain and the subsequent outcome (win or loss) with credit or debit of funds from their wallets!  Although the Spectre.ai beta is now live and can be accessed on www.spectre.ai, you will only be able to test it with actual trades on late Monday night GMT (1st, Jan 2018) onward, as the FX markets are currently closed on the weekend and will remain closed for New Year’s day holiday. Please note, as with any beta, bugs will surface and we will quash them over the coming 3 months ahead of our planned full-commercial-live launch in March end 2018. We look forward to your feedback as it will help us improve the platform.  https://medium.com/teamspectreai/spectre-ai-beta-out-7e0a62507b7c

Please let me know, thank you.  https://ethplorer.io/address/0x2c82c73d5b34aa015989462b2948cd616a37641f https://ethplorer.io/address/0x12b306fa98f4cbb8d4457fdff3a0a0a56f07ccdf

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: The management tokens are converted automatically through the smart contract as investors are converting their tokens so if you convert 10 SXS2 into 10 SXDT tokens, then the contract also converts 10 SXS2 of the management tokens into 10 SXDT tokens.  So as of right now 105 million of 182 million have been converted.

Author: all2much
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Spectre.ai.team, what has changed from three days ago when you said:   "After the investors have converted their tokens, then the management team will have their tokens converted so that will take place after the 28 days investors have."  Which of your answers is truthful and which one is made up?

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: "After the investors have converted their tokens, then the management team will have their tokens converted so that will take place after the 28 days investors have."  This is from 4 days ago.  A team member mistakenly answered a question incorrectly.  By team members I mean a member of the community management team.  After noticing that you were indeed correct that 105 million tokens had been converted we asked for clarification.  "The management tokens are converted automatically through the smart contract as investors are converting their tokens so if you convert 10 SXS2 into 10 SXDT tokens, then the contract also converts 10 SXS2 of the management tokens into 10 SXDT tokens.  So as of right now 105 million of 182 million have been converted."  This is the process that is in place.  Note to everyone here who doesn't know it, you can always stop into our telegram and speak with our CEO.  He is around for 12 to 16 hours a day.  Thank you for your understanding and please know that we, the community management team, are doing our best here.

Do the Legal/Advisors's tokens work like management and convert after the 28 day period? We will need that info to figure this out. Author: Saddko
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Miningguru. Spectre is a trading platform, where you trade different instruments using ETH. Spectre pays dividends weekly and yearly to its Dividend (D) -token holders. There is the other token - the Utility (U) token - and Spectre gives some benefits to U-token holders, who trade on the platform.  Not confusing at all! A company, who has two different tokens for its tokenholders to profit from.

Author: Saddko
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: The dividends will be paid weekly. We have not received information about the pay days or the expiry times - that we will get when we are nearer the beginning of dividend payments in April/May.  You can sell your Spectre tokens in exchanges for cryptocurrencies or fiat currencies. The exchanges will be announced later in December or early January. EtherDelta is trading the tokens already, but be carefull with that exchange. Spectre does not support it, and gives no advices for trading in ED.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Spectre: Eliminating Fraud with Decentralized Liquidity Pool  Cookeville, TN- Speculative Tokenised Trading Exchange, otherwise known as SPECTRE, is a new and innovative platform designed to rid the financial market of the ethical issues it faces.  SPECTRE was first developed in the fourth quarter of 2016 by Karan Khemani and Zisis Skoulouds of Neuchatel Ltd. Both of these men have strong backgrounds in the financial world. Khemani once held executive positions at companies such as J.P Morgan and Goldman Saches. He is a blockchain enthusiast who received his BSc and MSc in Decisions Sciences from the London School of Economics (LSE). Khenamani is responsible for the design, architecture, and expansion of SPECTRE into the marketplace. Skoulouds is an electrical engineer who has previously worked at INO SA & Siemens where he designed and implemented their ERP software. Skoulouds received his MSc in Decisions Sciences from the LSE and is responsible for the financial forecasting and risk management of SPECTRE’s liquidity pool. These two men, with the creation of SPECTRE, seek to rid the financial marketplace of the ethical issues of the traditional methodology.  https://coinidol.com/spectre-eliminating-fraud-with-decentralized-liquidity-pool/

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: SPECTRE Disrupts Financial Trading With the Removal of Brokers  Cookeville, TN-The traditional belief within the financial market is that brokers are an integral aspect of it. They arrange sales between trader and stock seller for a small commission. That commission was their due for filling a role that only they could fulfill.  The ethical issues that arose from this system, though known to traders, were an unavoidable risk that had to be taken. Traders had no way to fulfill the role of a broker effectively unless they wished to take on both roles at once. This, coupled with the power of the broker, prevented the broker's place in the financial trading system to remain undisrupted for nearly the entirety of financial trading history.  SPECTRE, the shortened form of Speculative Tokenized Trading Exchange, is an innovative platform that has disrupted this facet of the financial market. SPECTRE is built upon Ethereum blockchain technology. This is important as it allows traders to use crypto wallets, rather than an account controlled by a broker, to invest. Ethereum takes the place of the broker and automates all the processes associated with the role. Brokers, in the traditional model, make profits off of the loss of traders; the Ethereum technology makes no such profit from the deposit of funds from cryptocurrencies into SPECTRE’s liquidity pool. This reduces the motivation and core reasons that broker fraud occurs within the financial market. The broker, within SPECTRE’s business model, is no longer necessary.  More on COinidol.com: https://coinidol.com/spectre-disrupts-financial-trading-with-removal-of-brokers/

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Spectre Eliminates Fraud With First Broker-less Platform  Cookeville, TN- Speculative Tokenized Trading Exchange, shortened to SPECTRE, is different from the other ICO’s that claim to be disrupting the financial market.  The platform was created by Neuchatel Ltd whose founders, SPECTRE CEO Karan “Kay” Khemani and COO Zisis Skoulouds, explicitly designed the platform to be disruptive and innovative. It’s two innovative features, Tokenized Balance Sheets and Dividends along with an adaptive trade platform, are their most disruptive ones. Both features aim to reduce broker fraud by removing the perpetrator of fraud-the broker-,protecting the trader through algorithms, and promoting transparency within the platform.  The main perpetrators of fraud within the financial trading market are brokers. They have complete control over the investments, and therefore capita, of the trader from the moment they invest. Brokers make money off of the losses of their traders which results in a broker-trader dynamic that encourages such practices as dishonestly reporting market prices, providing hyped strategies designed to burn accounts intro the ground, trading without permission upon the behalf of the trader, and hindering withdrawals. This unhealthy dynamic encourages a 70-90% industry loss ratio that creates distrust in the financial market.  https://coinidol.com/spectre-eliminates-fraud-with-broker-less-platform/

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Sean Logan interviews Kay Published on Nov 15, 2017  The future of Digital Options, Forex and CFD trading is here. SPECTRE, short for speculative tokenised trading exchange, is a financial prediction market platform backed by a tokenised liquidity pool. Built on the Ethereum blockchain, SPECTRE's platform combined with the decentralised and autonomous liquidity pool owned by the token sale investors takes the broker out of the equation completely resulting in a revolutionary change in the trading world and a new level of transparency. Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: There are 2 types of tokens, a utility token and a dividend token.  The utility tokens give access to more privileges on the platform while the dividend tokens pay a weekly dividend and a special annual dividend.  Both tokens are their own separate entity and will be listed on different exchanges. Exchanges that welcome dividend-tokens would house SPECTRE’s dividend-tokens and the larger exchanges in the U.S who explicitly do not welcome dividend-tokens, would list SPECTRE’s utility-token.  For more information on the tokens you can check out this document here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1IMrbIf5YHo-GUqkpL0TBQWbDHzCaSG_Gadtvpm0AUBk  Quote from: Inc_BitSquirrel on November 14, 2017, 10:53:28 AM Hi Spectre.ai team,  Quick Question to you:  How are you planning to push Price Data on regular basis (on which the whole "trading" result is based) into Smart Contract / Blockchain? What are the guarantees that data will be accurate and provided in real time. Modification of Price Data, is a common way of fraud in Binary Options.  Can you address those issue in more detail?  Thanks in advance  Regards  Price feeds come from Oanda that is 1 provider but they are confirmed by 2 others and then sent as a packet to Oraclize. Then they are ingested by our smart contract.   Quote from: moriskarlov on November 14, 2017, 01:34:28 PM Hi Spectre Team, i also have a question, how long pulic token sale will last? I know that main croudsale starts on Nov.17th, but i`d like to note for myself when this ICO planning to be finished. I also very like the team policy, they are not hiding collected presale funds. All can be tracked on etherscan. Thanks.  The public sale starts Nov 17th and ends Dec 10th or when the max cap is reached.  There was no private sale before the pre-sale.   Quote from: fazzx on November 14, 2017, 02:11:43 PM Quote from: seek4dream on November 14, 2017, 01:56:02 PM Quote from: moriskarlov on November 14, 2017, 01:34:28 PM Hi Spectre Team, i also have a question, how long pulic token sale will last? I know that main croudsale starts on Nov.17th, but i`d like to note for myself when this ICO planning to be finished. I also very like the team policy, they are not hiding collected presale funds. All can be tracked on etherscan. Thanks. I suggest you take part in the ICO sooner rather than later. Don't forget 11% BONUS AVAILABLE FOR THE FIRST WEEK OF THE PUBLIC SALE And it is very possible that ICO will end in the first week.  I just registered on their website which asks how much ETH I will be investing, I now wanted to invest more then the amount I specified.  Would this be ok? or would I have to re-register with the exact amount I will be investing?  You do not have to send the amount you entered when registering.  You just have to send at least 1 eth since that is the min.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Dividends will be paid out on a weekly and yearly basis.  The weekly dividend is based off of trade volume and is paid in ETH. In order to receive that dividend, you would need to have your SPEC tokens on a wallet that you control. A personal MEW or any other ERC20 token wallet that you control. If you don't have it on a wallet you control then you will not receive the dividend. Say for an example you have your SPEC sitting on an exchange, the exchange would receive the ETH dividend as they control the wallet that it is sitting on.  The second type is a year dividend paid each January. This dividend is based on the excess ETH created each year in the liquidity pool. Each year a benchmark for growth of the liquidity pool will be set. If that benchmark is surpassed the excess ETH's will be distributed to the token holders and the Spectre team. This division will be 70% to the token holders and 30% to the team. This dividend is paid in ETH also. In order to receive that dividend, you would need to have your SPEC tokens on a wallet that you control. A personal MEW or any other ERC20 token wallet that you control. If you don't have it on a wallet you control then you will not receive the dividend. Say for an example you have your SPEC sitting on an exchange, the exchange would receive the ETH dividend as they control the wallet that it is sitting on.  As per legal counsel, we are not able to give any ROI Projections. You can, however, get information on this in our Forecasts model in the DDM section.

Author: Saddko
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: It's totally up to you which tokens you choose, you can choose either D-tokens, which distribute dividends or you can choose U-tokens, which give a trader more favourable features, when trading on the platform. Or you can choose both - say 60/40 - as you wish.  Remember - it is a trading platform, and you use ETH when trading the instruments. You do not use  U- or D-tokens for trading. You can trade on the platform even if you do not have tokens of Spectre at all. It's a free trading platform to anybody.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: The purpose of having two different types of tokens is to cater to all types of investors; ones that value yield above all and others that favor token liquidity over yield, as the utility-token will be featured in more exchanges than the dividend-token due to their different nature.  The holders of the dividend-token obtain a 2% dividend stream paid at the end of the week (and a special dividend at the end of the year), while the utility-token holders receive higher payouts on the trading platform itself and a wider variety of assets inside the platform as well as participation in the token buy-back program.  More info available here:  https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1IMrbIf5YHo-GUqkpL0TBQWbDHzCaSG_Gadtvpm0AUBk/edit#gid=0 https://medium.com/teamspectreai/spectre-ai-to-issue-two-token-types-14feee40c2e4  The supply not available in the sale will be used to purchase smaller brokerages looking to exit, two of which we have already run due-diligence on and received indicative fair valuation ranges for (c. $0.1-0.3m range cumulative). This will grow our platform userbase, bringing much more value to the dividends paid to D tokens, and at the same time this growth will increase demand for U tokens to gain the trading platform benefits. Then you factor in the U token buyback program.  You can read more here:  https://d1zzssn32v8b7a.cloudfront.net/media/en/spectre_whitepaper_v_2_3.pdf

Author: Coinve.st
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Yes I understand the differences thanks.  But that doesn't address my point about confusion and complexity.  Additionally, the dividend token is a security while the utility token is a network access token.  You've decentivized investors to invest in your utility token by offering a dividend in the security token.  Meanwhile you are also saying that your utility token is less risky than the other.  Having two tokens cannablizes the other.  Good luck, but unfortunately I'm not sure how having two adds value for an investor.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: I do see you asked on the bounty thread as well, but for everyone else's benefit:  Please clarify bounty questions with the Bounty Campaign Manager directly:  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=112240  I am sure he will get back to you shortly, thanks for your patience.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: The two token types cover different aspects of the investment case rather well. They were borne out of overwhelming investor demand. Originally there were just dividend tokens but because of the requests, two tokens were created. This has received great response from those who just want to earn dividends, those who just want to play the liquidity game on crypto exchanges, and those who want to do both.  Thank you for your feedback, I will pass it on to the team.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: There is no set number of d and u tokens.  You convert your sxs tokens to d and/or u tokens at whatever ratio you choose.  It is 1 sxs for 1 d or 1 u token. If you had 100 sxs tokens you could turn that to 100 d or 100 u tokens or a mix of d and u such as 30 u and 70 d.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: a) re SEC: Specifically we would use our U.S law firm to initiate talks with the CFTC that regulates such platforms (look at Nadex forexample which is CFTC regulated). We do not have a timeline on when or if a grant would be delivered as the market is protectionist to a certain degree. Hence it is not included in our forecasts.  b) Dividends are paid gross; declaring them to the taxman is your responsibility. We do not net away tax prior to disbursing them.

Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: If Spectre fails to obtain the regulatory compliance they are seeking to achieve between Q2 and Q4 2018, how will this impact the current financial forecasts?

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: It would have a negative impact on the financial forecasts but regulatory licensing is a routine matter.  Here is a quote from Kay, the CEO of SpectreAI, from telegram a few days ago regarding the same question:  "Sure. Who ever is concerned about "regulatory license acquisition" please ask them what about the entire brokerage industry and how they obtain licenses. What we are trying to obtain isn't something that is unheard of - its very run of the mill.  Not, what we are not going for is an investment advice and asset management license as we are not managing client funds. Although funnily enough our legal team has asked us to go ahead and get a hedge fund license as well"  Hopefully that answers your question.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: I was incorrect in my response earlier today.  I should have waited for a formal response from the internal team.  Please forgive me for the misunderstanding.   The response from Spectre.ai legal  "There is no downgrade to forecasts. Please note that there are hundreds of brokers that operate unregulated and their forecasts are unaffected by obtaining licenses or not. In fact because they are unregulated, they can offer more types of exotic contract types and leverage levels and actually see a gain in their market share. We have no intention of operating unregulated but note that the license we are going for is likely to be awarded in Q1 (first or 2nd month), not Q2 or Q4. The license grant is well before the platform even launches (we know because we have already started the process and all is well underway). In the very unlikely event the 'easy' jurisdiction where we are operating in, doesn't award the license, then we apply and obtain a Belize license. Failing that, then its simple, we operate unregulated following best practices. Please note, our forecasts are not reliant on obtaining licenses or not. However, our forecasts receive a 50% boost/upgrade if and when we obtain cftc/sec licenses but that process will take time (as with FCA). The reason behind the upgrade is owing to the sheer size of the U.S market. However this is not included in any of our 3 forecast scenarios (bear, base or bull). Our forecasts do not assume we obtain licenses and are not reliant on it. Please note ETX Binary is one of the best examples of an unregulated broker (ETX Capital is regulated by the FCA but ETX Binary is unregulated) that follows best practice but without any formal regulation. There are bucketshops that obtain regulation on offshore jurisdictions and operate within their "legal remits". Thanks."

Please note that, you will have 28 days time to convert your Stem tokens into U and/or D tokens. Converted U or D tokens are transferable immediately and we don't have any lock-in for the converted tokens. Also note that, converting to U or D token is a simple process and instructions for this will be published at a later date.  May of 2018 is when the first dividend payment is expected.

Author: PitL0rd2002
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Where we must keep dividends tokens for receive our dividends? In MyEtherWallet? Or in your platform? Dividends will be paid every month?

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: One type is a monthly dividend based off of trade volume. This dividend is paid in ETH. In order to receive that dividend, you would need to have your SPEC tokens on a wallet that you control. A personal MEW or any other ERC20 token wallet that you control. If you don't have it on a wallet you control then you will not receive the dividend. Say for an example you have your SPEC sitting on an exchange, the exchange would receive the ETH dividend as they control the wallet that it is sitting on.   The second type is a yearly dividend paid each January. This dividend is based on the excess ETH created each year in the liquidity pool. Each year a benchmark for growth of the liquidity pool will be set. If that benchmark is surpassed the excess ETH's will be distributed to the token holders and the Spectre team. This division will be 70% to the token holders and 30% to the team. This dividend is paid in ETH also. In order to receive that dividend, you would need to have your SPEC tokens on a wallet that you control. A personal MEW or any other ERC20 token wallet that you control. If you don't have it on a wallet you control then you will not receive the dividend.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: Hi, you were already responded to here: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2169122.msg23474749#msg23474749  I will copy/paste it here for those who missed it (including you):  I have investes in two other ICO's relating to Binary Options. And I have regretted this very much. These binary ICO's are popping up every day. Newest I think binary.com So after investing I looked (to late) into this business and the potential.  You haven’t read our whitepaper so if possible, try and stop ranting and carefully read our responses. Binary.com is a centralised Binary broker raising money to continue their existing model and tokenise end of year profits to dividends. Our’s removes the broker completely out of the equation and replaces them with a decentralised, autonomous liquidity pool (DALP) and P2P model. This allows traders to trade a range of digital options, smart CFDs and traditional a-book trading. Not sure what makes you believe we are a binary broker – there are no deposits on our platform and no broker present.  We don’t offer binary options. The nature of our contracts covers binary outcomes as well, however these are Smart Options and Smart CFDs (ULC) and other contract types. Everything is governed by smart contracts which is the big difference which you clearly have missed.  THIS SPECTRE PLATFORM WILL NEVER WORK !! (of course they do not care, only if the ICO works)  It already works. The pool has grown, traders love it. Defamatory statements that are misleading will result in you being tracked down and sued for defamation. We are happy to escalate this.  1. They say they will apply for a EU license The 1st of January MIFID II will get in effect, meaning 95% of all EU countries will ban Binary Options. So this license is worthless. It can only be used in the EU. US, Canada, Brasil and many other countries and continents have already stated that offering Binary options is illegal. Binary Options are dead !>> clearly no real research was done or ignored  We have actually met with regulators including CySEC. Clearly your understanding of MIFID 2 is lacking as MIFID 2 is not actually even published. MIFID 2 doesn’t ban binary options. There is no information on that. Binary Options are not allowed to be marketed in select regions like Canada or Israel. However, as you can see digital options are big in the U.S as traded under CFTC regulated NADEX who has no plans to ban them. Binary.com which operates under a gaming license in Malta is actually one of the market leaders and will they be shut down by MIFID 2? Absolutely not. Is IQ Option being shut down by CySEC? They are one of the biggest binary players in Europe and operating well within the law. Again, we offer Smart Options (both all or nothing and digital options however our contracts are governed by smart contracts on the Ethereum blockchain, so there is no opportunity for financial fraud) and CFDs and traditional A-Book trading. You have clearly misunderstood what Spectre.ai does.  2. Financial statement is total guess work (or just pumped up for this ICO) All other Binary ICO companies have set out income and cost of running a binary platform. Running such a platform cost a lot of money (especially marketing) and this all going to be paid for with a 2% margin , get real !  Actually our 2% model on SOs and 2-20% of spread on CFDs works like a charm. It more than covers our cost base (we don’t have account managers like you do at the broker you work for) so our human-asset intensity is far lower.  Also don’t forget we hold d tokens that participate in volumes not only on the normal divvy but end of year special divvy as well. That flows through as operating income. We’re a tech company, not a financial broker. Ergo, our cost base mirrors the former, not latter. Login to our platform and you can see the total dividends paid out, growth in the liquidity pool since the alpha went live around 1.5 months is over 5k ethers, which validates all of our forecasts. Our win rate assumptions included. We have the data, not sure what you’re operating on.  They state a client value of 2500, this is absurd. Not even the largest Forex brokers have such a value. Traders putting 8 trades every day ?? They do not go on holliday or take a break or stop trading...? >> this team has no experience and is making up numbers  Again, as you haven’t read our white paper or gone into our detailed Forecasts model, you are not in a position to speak with any real authority. Nowhere is the LTV stated as $2,500. It is at $800-900 (page 14 Whitepaper), go to our Forecasts model as well and look at cell B72. With regards to holidays and breaks, yes actually we do factor that in, look at cell number B71. It assumes 110 days of trading (which is based on actual FX and DO data). So everything you have categorically said is false and misleading. Now yes, if you divide Gross Revs by the number of traders you get a net-volume per trader of around $2.4k (aka gross-ltv) however the LTV to us and token holders (net-ltv) is far lower owing to the mechanics of the DALP. Additionally, the LTV for FX traders is far higher than BO traders and our forecasts include a blend of both types of traders not ‘depleted binary option traders’. Many European FX brokerages have client LTVs of EUR 3,000 +. Some are at EUR 1,800 but the average is way higher. Most importantly, our data and assumptions on both net-LTVs and gross-LTVs are coming from one of the market leaders in Europe in binaries (volumes, win-rates, everything) so we have actual data verification behind our assumptions.   3. NO CONFLICTOF INTEREST ?? Spectre is no broker, but it sure as hell is a counter party of their traders! Traders loose and the company wins. If clients win, this Holy Grale (the liquidity pool) is going to get empty and this means no income for the company (or token holders) , so what is keeping them from rigging the platform ?  Based on this question it is clear that you don’t understand how the Ethereum block chain works, nor how immutable smart contracts interface with multi-sig wallets. We are not a counterparty to anything. Trader trade p2p or against the DALP. The Ethereum blockchain guarantees orcalised pricing so truer and fairer entries and only smart contracts control fund flows (not humans) after trade outcomes (wins, losses, close TP/SLs). It is theoretically impossible for us to extract funds from the liquidity pool (DALP). The only way spectre.ai’s wallet and d token holder wallets get paid are through volumes (not just losses; we are agnostic whether the client wins or loses). Again, loosely glancing over our whitepaper but not actually understanding what we do is going to result in false conclusions.  They say all brokers are scammers (which is true). But where do they get this winrate of 52% (needed for them to make a profit). This company has no experience in running a binary company, so these numbers come from other brokers (correct: scam brokers) And why is the win rate so low, because if the broker does not scam, the winrate will be much higher!  The win rate is actually 49.8% on binary options and we have this from one of the market leaders in Europe with trade data totalling over thousands trades and thousands of customers (sign an NDA with us and we can release that information in confidence, no problem). We build in a higher win-rate on our platform (52%) because our trading platform actually has good risk management features and emotion control algorithms that ensure clients don’t destroy their account within weeks of depositing. Our current win-rate on the spectre.ai dapp which has seen millions in volume go through it already is tracking close to 52-54%.  4. Make a choice , token holders or traders ! Spectre is promoting the platform to traders and pretending that they will offer all the tools to be a successful trader. This is great ! For the traders, but not for the shareholders (clients need to loose to make money) On the other side they promote ICO investors that they are going to offer a profitable trading platform, in which clients will loose on average 2500€ ..  Again, as you haven’t read our white paper or gone into our detailed Forecasts model, you are not in a position to speak with any real authority. Nowhere is the LTV stated as $2,500. It is at $800-900 (page 14 Whitepaper), go to our Forecasts model as well and look at cell B72. With regards to holidays and breaks, yes actually we do factor that in, look at cell number B71. It assumes 110 days of trading (which is based on actual FX and DO data). So everything you have categorically said is false and misleading. Now yes, if you divide Gross Revs by the number of traders you get a net-volume per trader of around $2.4k (aka gross-ltv) however the LTV to us and token holders (net-ltv) is far lower owing to the mechanics of the DALP. Additionally, the LTV for FX traders is far higher than BO traders and our forecasts include a blend of both types of traders not ‘depleted binary option traders’. Many European FX brokerages have client LTVs of EUR 3,000 +. Some are at EUR 1,800 but the average is way higher. Most importantly, our data and assumptions on both net-LTVs and gross-LTVs are coming from one of the market leaders in Europe in binaries (volumes, win-rates, everything) so we have actual data verification behind our assumptions.  Whether you like it or not, take a look at Oanda’s latest audited reports, 65-70% of traders even in a safe a-book environment lose money. It’s that simple. Of course the traders that are good and deserve to win should get paid and that’s exactly what we create a true and fair trading environment. Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: It is first come first serve based on date of pre-sale Registration. The pre-sale will be based on a queue and entry to the pre-sale will be on first-come first-served basis. This is to maximize distribution and avoid network congestion. The pre-sale will be conducted in a phased manner. Emails will be sent to investors on October 26th (for actual contributions starting on the 27th) asking them to login at a specified time period in order to see the contribution address. Investors will be able to participate only during their allocated time slots and they will be getting a 24 hours window to participate. The exact times will be published on the aforementioned emails sent on October 26th.  The pre-sale commences on the 27th of October and ends on the 5th of November. During the first 3 phases (each phase lasts 24 hours) all the people that white-listed their ETH address will be invited via email to a password protected area where they will be able to send their contributions. The 4th phase will start at the beginning of the 4th day and all people regardless of being white-listed or not, will be able to participate.   Quote from: all2much on October 27, 2017, 01:59:46 PM At what point in the pre-sale do we decide on spec-d or spec-u? Can some people stay undecided to see which coin will be worth more?  During pre and public sale, stem tokens are delivered to investors instantly when purchased. These tokens become transferable to SPECTRE's Utility or Dividend token contracts after the token sale has ended, which is either 24 days after the start of the public sale or when the max cap is reached. Please note that, you will have 30 days time to convert your Stem tokens into U and/or D tokens. Converted U or D tokens are transferable immediately and we don't have any lock-in for the converted tokens. Also note that, converting to U or D token is a simple process and instructions for this will be published at a later date.

Author: Spectre.ai.team
Title: Spectre.ai information - Trading platform now LIVE!
Body: 1 ETh = 2000 tokens plus any bonus tokens during presale. The first 100 million tokens (c. $15 million in value) purchased in the pre-sale will carry with them a 33% bonus. Any additional tokens purchased during the presale will be sold with a 22% bonus. This means that if someone contributes, for example, 1 ETH to purchase 2.000 Tokens (as per the token price) before the first 100 million tokens are sold, then they will end up with 2,000 tokens plus 660 tokens; so in total 2,660 tokens. If their contribution happens after 100 millions tokens have been sold, then they will end up with 2.000 tokens plus 440 tokens, so in total 2,440 tokens.   Quote from: PokerStein1 on October 27, 2017, 04:26:42 AM Soo do we have any chance to sell out all tokens in pre-ico ? Do we have any max. cap for pre-ico period.  There is no cap for the pre-sale.
